name: The rocket project
description:
We're a new 100% indie little company of two starting to create games for mobiles and pc, this new project is just an idea and there will be a lot of changes, share any suggestion we'll listen all of them and try to make this game the best we can.

We have a lot of ideas

  • Levels
  • challenges
  • addictive and easy gameplay
  • Futuristic UI
  • Cool controls with finger or moving the cellphone
  • Secret Codes
  • Different rockets with different abilities and skins
  • Realistic bullets 
  • Power Ups
  • Progression Sistem
  • Procedural Levels

We'll upload a gameplay soon

Our Patreon! Support us
